data.text: Lemo mane Habakuk janabi olamo e dwond Shigionot3:1 Shigionot en kit wer mane Habakuk otiyogo kalamo Jehova Nyasaye. ema:
Masira mar tuoche notelo e nyime;
Ne aneno hemb jo-Kushan ka nigi chandruok,
Mirima nomaki gi aore, yaye Jehova Nyasaye?
gode ne oneni ma otetni giluoro;
Wangʼ chiengʼ gi dwe nochungʼ kargi e kor polo
E mirimbi ne iwuotho e piny duto,
To ne inyono nam gi faresegi,
Kata obedo ni yadh ngʼowu ok nyal thiewo
to kata kamano pod abiro bedo gi ilo kuom Jehova Nyasaye,
Jehova Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto e tekona;
